explains: n. 玛格丽塔（Margaret 的异体，女子名）；玛格丽塔（一种鸡尾酒名）

sentences.en: The margarita was the best I have ever had.
sentences.cn: 玛格丽塔酒是我至今饮用过的最好的酒了。

sentences.en: Every Russian knows the allegorical novel The Master And Margarita.
sentences.cn: 每个俄罗斯人都知道寓言小说《大师与玛格丽特》。

sentences.en: Margarita nudged the master to prompt him for the backsheesh.
sentences.cn: 玛格丽塔轻推主人，提示他给酒钱。
